text:
Oscar Health is a startup using technology, data & design to change the way people find and access care. We are disrupting the healthcare industry by putting people first, not business and cost. We also just received $375 million from Alphabet, a few weeks ago - come join the family!

https://www.hioscar.com

We're currently hiring for a variety of full-time/onsite roles in our New York City office, and now our new Engineering outpost in Los Angeles (Culver City):
